name: Scrolls (Magic Item Category)
guidance: Scrolls are rolls of paper or parchment, typically stored in protective tubes.
Spell Scrolls are most common, but some scrolls hold non-spell incantations.
Using a scroll requires reading it; after activation the scroll is consumed and its words fade or it crumbles.
Any creature that understands a written language can read a scroll and attempt to activate it unless noted otherwise.
